item.title: Exilers
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

The chatbox doesn’t look too bad, but most of the stuff i see here doesn’t look to special, try adding something new, new things attract more people

good luck with this

Also 2 more tips, make sure your forum isn’t a sub domain, it makes it look more professional

And that your webclient is hosted on your domain, when/if you plan on getting one, because it just doesn’t seem professional either made on a site like that :o

Read full topic
